content: Be aware that Java still interprets Unicode sequences within comments. For example, the Unicode sequence \u002a\u002f (whose codepoints correspond to */) is processed early in the Java compiler's lexical scanning of the source file, even before comments are processed, so this is a valid star-slash comment in Java:
stemmed: Be awar java still interpret unicod sequenc within comment . for exampl , unicod sequenc \u002a\u002f ( whose codepoint correspond */ ) process earli java compil 's lexic scan sourc file , even comment process , valid star-slash comment java :
